00001 // Class to represent a shape within the STAR geometry
00002 // Ben Norman, Kent State
00003 // 25 July 01
00004 
00005 #ifndef STI_CONICAL_SHAPE_H
00006 #define STI_CONICAL_SHAPE_H
00007 
00008 #include "StiShape.h"
00009 
00010 class StiConicalShape: public StiShape
00011 {
00012 public:
00013     
00014     // constructor
00015     StiConicalShape(): StiShape(), outerRadiusEast(0.), outerRadiusWest(0.),
00016                        openingAngle(0.){}
00017     StiConicalShape(float halfDepth_, float thickness_,
00018                     float outerRadiusEast_, float outerRadiusWest_,
00019                     float openingAngle_);
00020     
00021     // accessors
00022     float getOuterRadiusEast() const { return outerRadiusEast; }
00023     float getOuterRadiusWest() const { return outerRadiusWest; }
00024     float getOpeningAngle() const { return openingAngle; }
00025     StiShapeCode getShapeCode() const { return kConical; };
00026

00028     void setOuterRadiusEast(float val);
00029     void setOuterRadiusWest(float val);
00030     void setOpeningAngle(float val);
00031 
00032 protected:
00033     
00034     float outerRadiusEast;  // >= 0
00035     float outerRadiusWest;  // >= 0
00036     float openingAngle; // azimuthal extent of cylinder in radians in [0, 2pi]
00037     
00038 };
